entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Fog patches developing near midnight. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023
